description: This file defines a custom theme for the Flutter application, specifically named 'Ocean Theme'. It constructs and returns a ThemeData object with customized color schemes, widget themes (AppBar, Card, FloatingActionButton, InputDecoration, Divider, Checkbox, TextTheme), and uses Material 3 design components.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns a ThemeData object configured with Ocean Theme color palette and widget styles.
